What are the Linux dependencies required for Ubuntu 16.04/Xenial and Ubuntu 18.04/Bionic+?

For Ubuntu 16.04/Xenial, the required dependency is `libcurl4-openssl-dev`, which can be installed using `sudo apt install libcurl4-openssl-dev`. For Ubuntu 18.04/Bionic+, the required dependency is `libcurl4`, which can be installed using `sudo apt install libcurl4`.
